item.description: I recently wrote a blog post on what a zero downtime deployment is, why it is important, and how to perform one. item.title: Zero Downtime Deployment with the CF Autopilot Plugin
item.description: Zero down time deployments are a must for any Internet app running at scale. Without the use of zero down time deployments, you would have to take down your application even just for a fraction of a second but in that fraction of a second you could lose a transaction or a purchase from a customer. This is not acceptable anymore. Some people like to call these apps cloud based apps, which I think is fine, but Iâ€™d rather call them Internet scale or born on the cloud apps.
